title: The Trivium Proportion
description: This book is a set of serialized short stories. There are 12 short stories in all that form a whole cohesive story. Each story has an illustration by C.E. Zacherl (who also designed the cover art).The story is a near future cyberpunk theme that riffs on modern day topics. There are speculations on current farming techniques, congress, the NDAA, and big business conspiracies.
author: D. Hunter Phillips
